editorialNotes.standard: Created using gaming industry tech like 3D modeling and lighting effects, (Not Boring) Weather makes local forecasts delightfully interactive. Fun flourishes such as high-fidelity sound effects, charming animations, and just-noticeable haptic feedback make the weather report anything but boring.

An elegant blend of striking photography and nuanced information, Yahooâs interactive weather app will delight you every time you open it. Expanding the wonderfully streamlined interface reveals a 10-day forecast, heat and wind maps, and other handy displays, while a quick swipe lets you instantly check the temperature in another favorite location.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Carrot provides the weather with a little more...personality. If youâre OK with sarcasm, political jokes, and the occasional insult, it might be right for you. (That said, you can opt out of Carrotâs snark by disabling its personality in settings.) But how good is it at the weather part? Pretty great. Carrot draws its data from Foreca, one of meteorologyâs more accurate forecasting services.

editorialNotes.standard: Whether you are a surfing enthusiast or you simply live near an ocean, Tide Guide will keep you up-to-date with what you need to know for a smooth visit to the beach. The app allows you to track the tide, moon rise, and more with an elegantly designed interface that we canât help but take a peek at, even if weâre far from the shore.
